Concepts.longName: Patient Reported Outcomes Version of CTCAE
Concepts.definition: A library of items for patient self-reporting of symptoms and side effects associated with cancer treatment trials.
Electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds.
A group of independent but interrelated devices working together.

A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.
The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.
